name: DENDAM
description:
A nurse at clinic Z was used as experimental material and then killed by the clinic owner, the husband of the nurse did not accept the doctor's behavior, did the husband manage to get evidence of murder ?

The story of the murder! play 3 act, given several tasks to complete.
DENDAM is a game of hide and seek, you can fight and will be given weapons but can only load 1 bullet, besides that there will be ghosts that bother you, some puzzles to complete the task.

Dendam (Revenge) is a Hide and seek Action-Horror Game. 
=============================
Difficulty :
Practice
Normal
Hard
=============================
Play with 3 different gameplay :
ACT 1 : HOME
ACT 2 : HAUNTED
ACT 3 : MURDERER
